items.name: Bologna Board
items.description: Smoked & flash-fried bologna chunks with cheddar cheese, banana peppers, pickles, and crackers.

items.name: Pig Platter
items.description: 3 rib bones, smoked bologna, cheddar cheese, crackers, 3 BBQ sliders, and French fries.

items.name: Jalapeño Cornbread Basket
items.description: 6 homemade muffins served with butter.

items.name: Fried Pickles
items.description: 8oz of hand-battered dill pickle chips.

items.name: Basket of Rings
items.description: 10oz golden and crispy onion rings.

items.name: Cheese Beans
items.description: Fried cheddar and pepperjack cheese cubes.

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Choice of grilled chicken, pulled pork, or chili. Covered in cheese, queso, peppers, salsa, and sour cream.

items.name: Party Fries
items.description: Choice of pulled pork or chili, topped with queso, cheese, bacon, and sour cream.

items.name: Chips with Queso and Salsa
items.description: Housemade creamy queso and fresh salsa.

items.name: The Tavern Salad
items.description: Fresh greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, cheese, and croutons.

items.name: Table Burger
items.description: Black Angus beef, choice of cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickle. Served with 1 side.

items.name: Smokehouse Burger
items.description: Angus patty topped with BBQ pulled pork, cheddar, onion ring, and BBQ sauce. Served with 1 side.

items.name: The Big Rippy
items.description: Two 8oz Angus patties, bacon, American and Swiss, fried pickles, and special sauce. Served with 1 side.

items.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
items.description: Slow-smoked pulled pork on a toasted bun with BBQ sauce and slaw. Served with 1 side.

items.name: Catfish Po'Boy
items.description: Fried catfish fillets, lettuce, tomato, and remoulade on a hoagie roll. Served with 1 side.

items.name: Meat & 2 Sides
items.description: Served with a jalapeño cornbread muffin.

items.name: Meat & 3 Sides
items.description: Served with a jalapeño cornbread muffin.

items.name: 4 Veggie Plate
items.description: Choice of 4 tavern sides and a cornbread muffin.

items.name: Monkey Cake
items.description: Chocolate banana cake with chocolate chips, chocolate icing, caramel drizzle, and whipped cream.
